alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe; Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 9:20AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...GENESEE... MONROE...AND NIAGARA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 917 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Middleport to near Spencerport and slowly moving southeast. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Lockport, Batavia, Brockport, East Rochester, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Fairport, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Hamlin Beach State Park, Henrietta, Penfield, Newfane, Le Roy and Spencerport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 near exit 12. Interstate 90 between exits 48 and 46. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
